actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 106-714.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management

official_title: A bill to validate a conveyance of certain lands located in Carlton County, Minnesota, and to provide for the compensation of certain original heirs.

summary.text: Deems the conveyance of specified lands in Carlton County, Minnesota, through issuance of a patent by the Director of the Bureau of Land Management on February 17, 1955, to be valid. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to notify the 46 original heirs of the lands of: (1) their right to compensation for the conveyance of such lands; and (2) the procedures for applying to receive that compensation.

titles.title: A bill to validate a conveyance of certain lands located in Carlton County, Minnesota, and to provide for the compensation of certain original heirs.
